intro: Epilobium balansae, commonly known as the Balansae willowherb, is a species of flowering plant in the family Onagraceae. It is native to southern Europe and parts of western Asia, typically found in moist meadows and riverbanks. The plant produces showy, pink to red flowers that bloom in late summer. Its leaves are opposite, lance-shaped, and covered in fine hairs. Epilobium balansae is often used in ecological restoration projects due to its ability to stabilize soil and support local wildlife.
